text: Tumhi sanga ki mi tara tumacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe (hoya)majhyakade vahyi(prakasana)keli jate ki sarvanca upasya kevala ekaca upasya ahe, tara jyala dekhila apalya palanakartyasi bhetanyaci asa asela, tyane satkarma karita rahile pahije, ani apalya palanakartyacya bhakti-upasaneta1 dusarya konalahi sahabhagi karu naye
